fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Check a player to see if they are a ToS role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If they are, gain a chat with them.
-If they are not, deal a Powerful Attack.
-While you are alive, the game *must* follow all the Town of Salem rules. Basically Rule 4 doesnt apply.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Be the only one standing, except you can spare ToS roles.
